show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: Martha Rosenberg
content:
My guest Martha Rosenberg is a genuine investigate reporter. <!--more--> Did you know the feds are developing a “vaccine”  for alcoholism and drug addiction?
Or that Sgt Bales who murdered innocent Afghans was taking Larium, an anti-malarial drug that causes violence and suicide?  A spirited discussion.
  Listen and learn from Martha.
